聉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wà］
［《廣韻》五滑切，入黠，疑。］
懵懂无知，拙于表达。
[②]［tuǐ］
［《廣韻》吐猥切，上賄，透。］
义未详。
[③]［zhuó］
［《廣韻》丁滑切，入黠，端。］
聋，听不到。

聉字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【耳字部】　聉； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页966第28
【唐韻】【集韻】?五滑切，瓦入聲。【說文】無知意也。　又【廣韻】魚乙切，音屹。義同。　又【廣韻】【集韻】?吐猥切，音腿。聉顡，癡癲貌。　又【廣韻】丁滑切，音娺。無所聞也。

聉字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
聉字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wà］
["Guangyun" five slippery cuts, into the corner, doubt. ]
I am ignorant and clumsy to express.
[②]［tuǐ］
["Guangyun" vomiting and cutting, bribing, and thorough. ]
The meaning is unclear.
[③] [zhuó]
["Guangyun" Ding sliding cut, into the corner, end. ]
Deaf, can't hear.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not concentrated] [Ear word department] 　聉; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 966 28
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Five slippery cuts, tiles into the sound. [Said the text] I am ignorant.　[Guang Yun] Yu Yi cuts, Yin Yi. The same meaning.　[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Tumbling and cutting, sounding legs. Fool, crazy appearance.　[Guangyun] Ding Huaqie, Yinwa. Unheard of also.
